sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import './RequestPage.css' import TradeImages from '../tradeimages/TradeImages' function RequestPage({ userItems, showClickedItem, setCart, cart, handleRequest, setMoney, setSpin, spin}) { const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({}) const { bio, full_name, location, items, image } = userItems let navigate = useNavigate() const mappedItems = items.map(item => { return }) useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:9292/users/${showClickedItem.user_id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(userData => setUserInfo(userData)) }, [userItems]) console.log(userData) return ( <>

{showClickedItem.item_name}

Condition: {showClickedItem.condition}/10

Description: {showClickedItem.description}

Original Price: ${showClickedItem.original_pricing}

Swap with {userInfo.full_name}

{userInfo.full_name}

{userInfo.location}

Bio: {userInfo.bio}

Select Item Below

{spin ? : null} {cart.id ? : null}

If you wish to offer $ on top of the swap, enter here

Press REQUEST SWAP to offer {userInfo.full_name} a swap

Your Profile: {full_name}

{full_name}

{location}

Bio: {bio}

Select An Item To Swap With {userInfo.full_name}

{mappedItems}
) } export default RequestPage;
